What is the difficulty level for items requiring 50% to 89% Spot Hidden skill?
Hard difficulty

setting up an elaborate rig inside one’s jacket

What happens if an insane investigator fails a pushed roll?
They act like a kleptomaniac.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the Spot Hidden skill and its importance?

This skill allows the user to spot a secret door or compartment, notice a hidden intruder, find an inconspicuous clue, recognize a repainted automobile, become aware of ambushers, notice a bulging pocket, or anything similar. This is an important skill in the armory of an investigator.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the consequence of stealing a priceless diamond?
You begin to notice that for the last week you have been tailed by a mysterious dark figure, and you're caught red-handed.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the punishment for being caught stealing a priceless diamond?
You're taken out back and shown the business end of a couple of baseball bats.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens if a character spots something briefly?
The Keeper may raise the level of difficulty.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How does the Keeper adapt the difficulty level?
The difficulty level might be adapted to reflect the environment.

What skill is used to set the difficulty level when searching for a character who is hiding?
The opponent’s Stealth skill.

What can increase the difficulty level during a search for something that has been well hidden?
Taking more time to observe the area, pulling the place apart, dismantling the furniture and smashing the porcelain statuettes.

What are the consequences of failing a Pushed roll?
inadver-tently drop something of your own while searching
